title: Inclusive Virtual Education Design: Language Learning Environments for All

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device (Smartphone) Usage Skills, General Language Learning Understanding
context.additional_context: A real-time language education course applying Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more language learning activities reflecting diverse accessibility requirements according to UDL principles
Learners can produce at least two types of inclusive educational content (text/audio/image) usable in mobile environments
Learners can apply and evaluate three or more engagement strategies considering learner diversity in real-time video lecture environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
